attributes.review: I downloaded the app with high hopes of supporting my president Donald Trump. However, I cannot get the app to work!!!! Additionally my iphone alerted me that the app is constantly tracking my location! The russians have hacked the app!! DONT DOWNLOAD THE RUSSIANS ARE STEALING MY INFORMATION!
attributes.title: I’m confused?

attributes.review: This app is horrible! It constantly crashes and makes my phone run slowly.
attributes.title: Poor Quality

attributes.review: My grandma borrowed my phone quick to make a call, she accidentally opened the app and the title screen gave her a seizure!!!! Not cool!!! If I could give a zero star rating I would!!!
attributes.title: Worst App I’ve Ever Come Across

attributes.review: The app kept shutting off my phone and I would have to turn it on all the way and then it would kill its battery
attributes.title: Trump

attributes.review: this app did not do our orange president justice! the person who did the design simply had no idea how much user interface opens up the possibilities of an app. DO NOT USE
attributes.title: horrible horrible app

attributes.review: Bruh the app keep glitching like my phone ain’t bad . It just crashed me out. I wanted to see what our wonderful ✨orange✨ was up to and it crashed. This app is ✨very sucky✨😌✌️ please fix this thank you😭😌💅🏽💅🏽
attributes.title: This is bad

attributes.review: Upon installing I was asked if the app could scan my toenail clippings, when I clicked decline my toes proceeded to turn pink and fall off. would give zero stars if I could
attributes.title: Don’t buy this app

attributes.review: I am outraged 😡. this app CRASHED A LOT. it kicked me out of the app and wouldnt let me use it correctly. it would glitch and not even work. REMOVE THIS FROM THE APP STORE NOW. It only makes your phone crash for no reason. I DEMAND YOU TO. HORRIBLE HORRIBLE APP. DISGUSTING
attributes.title: What is this .

attributes.review: This app took days to download, and after a week or so when it finished i started noticing bugs and glitches on it. Tysm🧸 orange 🧸
attributes.title: Too many glitches

attributes.review: I’m not part of gen z’s stupid prank, I just wanted to support MY president, but this app is the REAL “virus”. it kept crashing, and then my phone did too! I had to wipe the data in order to even right this review
attributes.title: TRASH
